overview:
Tamirirashe Zhou in a netprenuer who focuses on online marketing tools,resources and strategies which can be effectively used by online markers,business people and individuals alike. He has experience in the eduction sector where he has worked for almost three years as a History teacher.Tamirirashe is a holder of a B.A General degree specialising in Economic History and theatre arts.He is currently studying for a B.com degree specialising in Entrepreneurship.He has also worked as a research assistant for the department of Theatre Arts at the University of Zimbabwe.

Besides his teaching experience,Tamirirashe aqcuired sales and marketing knowledge after working in the Timeshare Industry as a Sales and Marketing Exucative for three years.Besides,he has worked as an online marketer and is the current Managing Director of 911Marketing Solutions.
